However, I find the performance to be unusually high (much higher than reported values, <denchmark-link:https://arxiv.org/pdf/1801.07791.pdf>https://arxiv.org/pdf/1801.07791.pdf</denchmark-link> , supplementary page 3 for pointnet++). Am I interpreting the results in the wrong way or is there some bug in the evaluation code? Thanks! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23709936/60408354-8c1dca00-9b8c-11e9-818a-def1e52b051c.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Ah, this looks like a bug in the iou computation when not all classes are present in a mini-batch. I will look into it.
Should be fixed in master. You need to recreate ShapeNet dataset in order to test. Sorry for the inconveniences!
Thank you so much for the quick response.
